sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T0.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (
SELECT b.ORGNZT_NM, a.ESNTL_ID, a.USER_NM, a.EMPL_NO, a.OFCPS_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNORGNZTINFO b ON a.ORGNZT_ID = b.ORGNZT_ID WHERE 1=1
NVL(b.ORGNZT_NM, ' ') LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
NVL(a.USER_NM, ' ') LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
ORDER BY b.ORGNZT_NM, a.USER_NM ASC
) T0 ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(EMPLYR_ID) as cnt FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNORGNZTINFO b ON a.ORGNZT_ID = b.ORGNZT_ID WHERE 1=1
NVL(b.ORGNZT_NM, ' ') LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
NVL(a.USER_NM, ' ') LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
SELECT OFCPS_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE ESNTL_ID = #wrterId#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T0.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (
SELECT A.REPRT_ID, C.CODE_NM REPRT_SE, A.REPRT_SJ, A.REPORT_DE, B.USER_NM WRTER_NM, A.REPORT_BGNDE, A.REPORT_ENDDE, (CASE WHEN NVL(A.CONFM_DT, ' ') = ' ' THEN '미승인' ELSE '승인' END) CONFM_DT FROM COMTNWIKMNTHNGREPRT A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO B ON A.WRTER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE C ON C.CODE_ID = 'COM060' AND A.REPRT_SE = C.CODE WHERE (A.WRTER_ID = #searchId# OR A.REPORTR_ID = #searchId#)
A.REPORT_DE BETWEEN #searchBgnDe# AND #searchEndDe#
(A.REPORT_BGNDE BETWEEN #searchBgnDe# AND #searchEndDe# OR A.REPORT_ENDDE BETWEEN #searchBgnDe# AND #searchEndDe# )
A.REPRT_SJ LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
B.USER_NM LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
NVL(A.CONFM_DT, ' ') = ' '
NVL(A.CONFM_DT, ' ') != ' '
A.REPRT_SE = '1'
A.REPRT_SE = '2'
ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
) T0 ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(A.REPRT_ID) as cnt FROM COMTNWIKMNTHNGREPRT A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO B ON A.WRTER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID WHERE (A.WRTER_ID = #searchId# OR A.REPORTR_ID = #searchId#)
A.REPORT_DE BETWEEN #searchBgnDe# AND #searchEndDe#
(A.REPORT_BGNDE BETWEEN #searchBgnDe# AND #searchEndDe# OR A.REPORT_ENDDE BETWEEN #searchBgnDe# AND #searchEndDe# )
A.REPRT_SJ LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
B.USER_NM LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
NVL(A.CONFM_DT, ' ') = ' '
NVL(A.CONFM_DT, ' ') != ' '
A.REPRT_SE = '1'
A.REPRT_SE = '2'

SELECT A.REPRT_ID, A.REPRT_SE, A.REPRT_SJ, A.REPORT_DE, A.WRTER_ID, B.USER_NM WRTER_NM, B.OFCPS_NM WRTER_CLSF_NM, A.REPORTR_ID, C.USER_NM REPORTR_NM, C.OFCPS_NM REPORTR_CLSF_NM, A.REPORT_BGNDE, A.REPORT_ENDDE, A.THSWIK_REPORT_CN, A.NEXTWIK_REPORT_CN, A.PARTCLR_MATTER, A.ATCH_FILE_ID, A.CONFM_DT, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNWIKMNTHNGREPRT A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO B ON A.WRTER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO C ON A.REPORTR_ID = C.ESNTL_ID WHERE A.REPRT_ID = #reprtId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNWIKMNTHNGREPRT SET REPRT_SE=#reprtSe#, REPRT_SJ=#reprtSj#, REPORT_DE=#reprtDe#, WRTER_ID=#wrterId#, REPORTR_ID=#reportrId#, REPORT_BGNDE=#reprtBgnDe#, REPORT_ENDDE=#reprtEndDe#, THSWIK_REPORT_CN=#reprtThswikCn#, NEXTWIK_REPORT_CN=#reprtLesseeCn#, PARTCLR_MATTER=#partclrMatter#, ATCH_FILE_ID=#atchFileId#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = sysdate, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE REPRT_ID = #reprtId#
UPDATE COMTNWIKMNTHNGREPRT SET CONFM_DT=#confmDt# WHERE REPRT_ID = #reprtId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNWIKMNTHNGREPRT ( REPRT_ID, REPRT_SE, REPRT_SJ, REPORT_DE, WRTER_ID, REPORTR_ID, REPORT_BGNDE, REPORT_ENDDE, THSWIK_REPORT_CN, NEXTWIK_REPORT_CN, PARTCLR_MATTER, ATCH_FILE_ID, CONFM_DT, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID )VALUES( #reprtId#, #reprtSe#, #reprtSj#, #reprtDe#, #wrterId#, #reportrId#, #reprtBgnDe#, #reprtEndDe#, #reprtThswikCn#, #reprtLesseeCn#, #partclrMatter#, #atchFileId#, '', sysdate, #frstRegisterId#, sysdate, #lastUpdusrId# )
